articles.title: I changed 10 settings on my Pixel phone to give it an instant performance boost - ZDNET
articles.description: Pixel phones come packed with awesome features - but these settings will take your experience to the next level.

articles.title: Your TV's USB port has an underutilized benefit that can refresh an old system - here's how - ZDNET
articles.description: Updating your TV's firmware can boost performance, add new features, and fix bugs. Here's how to do it offline with just a USB drive.

articles.title: Samsung is selling refurbished Galaxy S24 phones at discounted prices (including the Ultra) - ZDNET
articles.description: Samsung's Certified Renewed program lets you score a like-new flagship phone for less - and do your part to cut down on e-waste.

articles.title: Community Day Vanilluxe in PvP: A Chilly Reception? - Pokémon GO Hub
articles.description: Community Day is here again, and we get a sweet treat with VANILLUXE. But is it sweet in PvP with the addition of a new move? Honestly, no need for a Bottom Line Up Front today, because in short... the answer is no. Very no. But come with me as we explore WHY…

articles.title: Elena's crazy photo with Akuma is the basis for her story in Street Fighter 6 - EventHubs
articles.description: Endings and text for characters in the Street Fighter franchise aren't always canon. For example, in M. Bison's Champion Edition ending, his armies rise up to take over the whole world, something he hasn't officially accomplished.Also ...

articles.title: Movie star's 175-year-old New Orleans home listed for $4.75M - Chron
articles.description: A 1850s home in the Garden District of New Orleans, previously owned by Trent Reznor, has been listed by actor John Goodman for $4.75 million.
